title: AI Automation Suite
description: A comprehensive tool leveraging Gen AI to automate repetitive web tasks.

sections.title: Project Overview
sections.content:
This project leverages **Generative AI** to revolutionize how we interact with the web. It is designed to act as an intelligent agent that can perform tasks on your behalf.

### Core Capabilities
- **Auto-Login**: Securely manages credentials for multiple sites.
- **Data Scraper**: Smart parsing of unstructured data using NLP.
- **Report Generation**: Creates PDF summaries automatically.

sections.title: Dashboard & Analytics
sections.content: The dashboard provides real-time insights into the automation tasks.

sections.title: Dashboard & Analytics
sections.content: The **dashboard provides** real-time insights into the automation tasks.

title: Midnight Portfolio
description: Luxury portfolio website designed with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

sections.title: Design Philosophy
sections.content: Using a **Dark Mode First** approach, we integrated *Gold Metallic* gradients to signify luxury and precision. The goal was to create something that stands out from the typical developer portfolio.

sections.title: Technical Innovation
sections.content: Powered by **Framer Motion**, every element on the page enters the stage with a calibrated delay, creating a sense of theatrical performance.
